title: Does the NBA have a James Harden Problem? | The Answer
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan searches for solutions to the James Harden saga on the debut episode of “The Answer”. First, Chris is joined by Kirk Goldsberry (ESPN) to rank implausible-but-technically-possible Harden trades (07:00) and then Musa Okwonga (Stadio, Ringer FC) dials in to compare the rise of soccer-like transfer requests from NBA stars (36:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Kirk Goldsberry and Musa Okwonga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
